item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官称无证据表明债券发行不当行为给纳税人造成了损失
item.description: 澳新银行首席执行官谢恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliot）周五表示，没有证据表明该银行涉嫌在债券发行方面的不当行为给澳大利亚纳税人造成了损失。【原文：ANZ CEO Shayne Elliot said on Friday there was no evidence that suspected misconduct by the bank over bond issuance had cost the Australian taxpayer.】

item.title: 优步首席执行官称，尽管处于劣势，但在韩国的发展前景广阔
item.description: 优步（Uber Technologies Inc）首席执行官周五表达了对韩国市场的承诺，并表示该平台将吸引更多出租车司机以促进增长。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc's CEO on Friday expressed commitment to the South Korean market, where it is an underdog to local tech group Kakao , and said the platform will attract more taxi drivers for growth.】

item.title: 对冲基金可能因特木公司所有者 PDD 的股价暴跌而损失数十亿美元
item.description: 集中押注中国热门电子商务巨头滴滴出行控股公司（PDD Holdings），可能导致对冲基金因该公司高管发表负面言论后股价暴跌而损失数十亿美元。【原文：Concentrated bets on popular Chinese e-commerce giant PDD Holdings may have led to losses in billions of dollars for hedge funds from a crash in its shares following downbeat comments from its executives.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将实现月度稳健上涨，美元因美国降息押注增加而下滑
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市上涨，有望在八月末稳健收官，而美元则面临九个月来最差的月度表现，原因是美联储几乎肯定会在下个月降息。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Friday and were poised for a solid end to August while the dollar was staring at its worst monthly performance in nine months, on the view that the Federal Reserve is all but certain to cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 7 月零售销售持平
item.description: 澳大利亚的零售业在经历了几个月受打折活动提振的乐观业绩后，7 月份的销售额持平，由于购物者变得节俭，服装和百货商店的消费受到打击。【原文：Australian retail sales went flat in July after a couple of months of upbeat results boosted by discounting events, with spending on clothes and at department stores taking a hit as shoppers turned frugal.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司停止交易，评估监管结论的影响
item.description: 星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周五表示，该公司在澳大利亚上市的股票已停止交易，以便该赌场运营商消化有关其企业文化的一份尖锐批评报告的影响，并评估其对 2024 财年业绩的影响。【原文：Star Entertainment said on Friday its Australia-listed shares were halted from trading for the casino operator to digest the fallout from a scathing report on its corporate culture and assess the implications on its fiscal 2024 results.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注减少，美元将结束五周连跌走势
item.description: 周五，美元兑主要货币汇率接近一周高点，有望结束连续五周的跌势，此前强劲的经济数据降低了对美联储积极降息的押注。【原文：The dollar traded near a one-week high versus major peers on Friday, on track to snap a five-week losing run, after robust economic data pared bets for aggressive Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 玩家评估中东供应忧虑，石油保持稳定
item.description: 周五早盘，油价持稳，因为投资者权衡了中东的供应担忧和需求减弱的迹象。【原文：Oil prices were steady in early trading on Friday as investors weighed supply concerns in the Middle East against signs of weakened demand.】

item.title: Lululemon 在 "Breezethrough "惨败后快速推出热门新款式
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 的 "Breezethrough "紧身裤曾受到令人尴尬的评价，导致该公司将其下架，为了摆脱这一尴尬局面，这家价格不菲的运动休闲产品制造商周四承诺将快速向市场推出热销款式。【原文：Eager to move on from embarrassing reviews of its "Breezethrough" leggings that led Lululemon Athletica to pull them off shelves, the pricey athleisure maker on Thursday promised to fast-track hot styles to the market.】

item.title: 日本首都 8 月份核心通胀率年同比上升 2.4
item.description: 周五的数据显示，8月份日本首都的核心消费价格同比上涨2.4%，连续第四个月加速上涨，使市场对未来几个月进一步加息的预期保持活力。【原文：Core consumer prices in Japan's capital rose 2.4% in August from a year earlier, data showed on Friday, accelerating for the fourth straight month and keeping alive market expectations of further interest rate hikes in coming months.】

item.title: 日本 7 月失业率升至 2.7%，就业岗位增加
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本 7 月份的失业率从 6 月份的 2.5% 上升至 2.7%。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in July rose to 2.7% from 2.5% in June, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 中国央行的政策武器库
item.description: 中国人民银行（PBOC）的目标是建立一条更加市场化的利率曲线，放弃量化政策工具，帮助经济摆脱国家指导的银行贷款。【原文：The People's Bank of China (PBOC) aims to create a more market-driven interest rate curve and move away from quantitative policy tools to help wean the economy off state-directed bank lending.】

item.title: 中国的利率改革将是一个 "艰巨而漫长 "的过程
item.description: 中国央行希望转变政策框架，以信贷成本而非信贷规模为目标，但流动性风险和不合作的市场使中国经济难以摆脱国家引导的银行贷款。【原文：China's central bank wants to shift its policy framework to target the cost of credit rather than its size, but liquidity risks and uncooperative markets are making it difficult to transition the economy away from state-directed bank lending.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克和特斯拉赢得了对声称他们操纵狗狗币的诉讼的驳回
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和他的电动汽车公司特斯拉（Tesla）赢得了一项联邦诉讼的撤诉，该诉讼指控他们通过炒作加密货币 dogecoin 和进行内幕交易欺诈投资者，造成了数十亿美元的损失。【原文：Elon Musk and his electric vehicle company Tesla won the dismissal of a federal lawsuit accusing them of defrauding investors by hyping the cryptocurrency dogecoin and conducting insider trading, causing billions of dollars of losses.】

item.title: 直觉机器公司获得美国国家航空航天局（NASA）价值 1.169 亿美元的合同，用于向月球南极送货
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）授予直觉机器公司一份价值 1.169 亿美元的合同，向月球南极运送六个科技有效载荷。【原文：NASA has awarded Intuitive Machines a $116.9 million contract to deliver six science and technology payloads to the Moon's south pole, the space exploration company said, sending its shares up 16% after the bell.】

item.title: 亚洲 数据洪峰为过山车月画上句号
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国破产法院批准对 SunPower 资产的跟踪竞购
item.description: 美国破产法院法官周四批准了竞争对手 Complete Solaria 以 4500 万美元竞购倒闭的住宅太阳能公司 SunPower 的资产。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy court judge approved on Thursday a $45 million bid for the assets of failed residential solar company SunPower by rival Complete Solaria.】

item.title: OpenAI 称 ChatGPT 的每周用户已增至 2 亿人
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 OpenAI 周四表示，其聊天机器人 ChatGPT 的周活跃用户数量已超过 2 亿，是去年秋季的两倍。【原文：AI startup OpenAI said on Thursday its chatbot ChatGPT now has more than 200 million weekly active users, double the number it had in the last fall season.】

item.title: 杠杆式英伟达 ETF 发行商的看跌产品在财报发布前交易激增
item.description: 根据一些发行产品的公司提供的数据，在芯片制造商英伟达发布季度财报之前，投资者对允许投资者在英伟达股价下跌时获利的杠杆式交易所交易基金的兴趣稳步增长。【原文：Interest in leveraged exchange-traded funds that allow investors to profit when shares of Nvidia fall grew steadily ahead of the chipmaker's quarterly results, according to data from some of the companies that issued the products.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表戴维斯称赞加拿大对中国电动汽车和金属征收新的高额关税
item.description: 美国贸易代表凯瑟琳-戴（Katherine Tai）周四对加拿大决定对中国制造的电动汽车征收100%的关税以及对中国钢铁和铝征收25%的关税表示强烈支持，同时她也敲定了美国计划征收的类似税率。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Thursday gave a strong endorsement to Canada's decision to impose a 100% tariff on Chinese-made electric vehicles and 25% on Chinese steel and aluminum as she finalizes U.S. duties planned at similar rates.】

item.title: 特拉华州与其他州就无人认领的速汇金资金达成和解
item.description: 在美国最高法院去年一致裁定特拉华州无权将数亿美元未兑现的速汇金支票据为己有后，30 个州将从特拉华州获得超过 1.02 亿美元的赔偿。【原文：Thirty states are set to receive more than $102 million from Delaware after the U.S. Supreme Court last year unanimously ruled that it had no right to keep hundreds of millions of dollars in uncashed MoneyGram checks for itself.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州缩小天然气厂项目范围，争夺 54 亿美元资金
item.description: 德克萨斯州公用事业委员会（Public Utility Commission of Texas）周四表示，在一项旨在促进天然气发电厂发展的新计划中，该委员会选定了 17 个项目，寻求 53.8 亿美元的政府资助。【原文：The Public Utility Commission of Texas selected 17 projects, seeking $5.38 billion in government funding, to advance in a new program aimed at spurring the development of gas-fired power plants, the regulators said on Thursday.】

item.title: 竞选团队称，特朗普将废除拜登的清洁电力规定，加快电厂审批速度
item.description: 共和党总统竞选团队周四表示，唐纳德-特朗普将废除乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统的多项清洁能源规定，同时加快发电厂的审批速度，以满足美国日益增长的电力需求。【原文：Donald Trump would rescind many of President Joe Biden's clean energy rules while also speeding approvals of power plants to meet the nation's rising electricity demands, the Republican's presidential campaign said on Thursday.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 下调年度预期，原因是美容产品需求放缓
item.description: Ulta Beauty 周四下调了年度销售额和利润预期，原因是其门店对高价化妆品和香水的需求放缓。【原文：Ulta Beauty cut its annual sales and profit forecasts on Thursday, hurt by slowing demand for higher-priced cosmetics and fragrances at its stores.】

item.title: Venture Global 寻求路易斯安那工厂首批液化天然气试运行货物的卸货许可
item.description: 美国液化天然气（LNG）公司Venture Global LNG周四寻求美国能源监管机构授权，在8月30日前在路易斯安那州在建的普拉克明出口工厂卸载第一批LNG试运行货物。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas (LNG) company Venture Global LNG sought authorization on Thursday from U.S. energy regulators by Aug. 30 to unload the first LNG commissioning cargo at the Plaquemines export plant under construction in Louisiana.】

item.title: 休闲服装制造商 Lululemon 因需求放缓下调年度预期
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 周四下调了年度销售额和利润预期，原因是北美市场竞争加剧，以及消费者对其价格昂贵的紧身裤和背心的消费有所选择。【原文：Lululemon Athletica cut its annual sales and profit forecasts on Thursday, hurt by increased competition and selective consumer spending in its pricey leggings and tank tops in North America.】

item.title: 人工智能服务器需求强劲，戴尔第二季度营收超预期
item.description: 戴尔科技公司周四公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是在个人电脑市场复苏的背景下，市场对其人工智能服务器的需求强劲。【原文：Dell Technologies beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by strong demand for its AI-powered servers amid a recovering personal computer market.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计的用户的社交媒体平台 X 出现故障
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 报道，社交媒体平台 X 周四下午遭遇停电。【原文：Social media platform X suffered outages on Thursday afternoon, according to outage tracking site Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会称，纳斯达克期货公司将支付 2200 万美元以了结有关津贴计划的指控
item.description: 纳斯达克已同意支付 2200 万美元，以了结美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）对其前能源合约市场未披露向某些交易员提供津贴细节的指控。【原文：Nasdaq has agreed to pay $22 million to settle U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) charges that its former energy contract market failed to disclose details of perks offered to certain traders.】

item.title: 存储经纪人称，7 月份全球 IT 故障加剧了加州燃料存储问题
item.description: 储油经纪商 The Tank Tiger 本周告诉路透社，上个月的 CrowdStrike IT 故障导致数十架航班停飞，给加利福尼亚州的燃油市场带来了新的问题，迫使美国贸易商将运往该州的航空燃油储存在水运油轮上。【原文：Last month's CrowdStrike IT outage that grounded scores of flights created new problems for California's fuel market, forcing U.S. traders to store jet fuel destined for the state on waterborne tankers, storage broker The Tank Tiger told Reuters this week.】
